com.logiccity.minecraft.api

Interface GameControl


  • public interface GameControl
    The interface for controlling the player or game states

      • marchAttackEntity

        boolean marchAttackEntity(java.lang.String chosenName,
                          int waitMs)
        March toward and attack the named entity
        Parameters:
        chosenName - entity name
        waitMs - the minimal wait time in milliseconds between consecutive attacks
        Returns:
        target dead or can't be attacked

        void setPlayerKnockBackEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable/Disable the knock back effect on the player
        Parameters:
        enabled - false will disable knock back effect

      • initArmorStatusUI

        void initArmorStatusUI(java.lang.String listMode,
                       java.lang.String alignMode,
                       boolean showPercent,
                       boolean showMaxDamage)
        Initialize armor status UI
        Parameters:
        listMode - armor list mode: 'horizontal' or 'vertical'
        alignMode - UI align mode: 'bottomLeft', 'bottomCenter', or 'bottomRight'
        showPercent - whether show damage as percentage
        showMaxDamage - whether to show max damage

                              int y,
                              int z,
                              int placeDir)

        Parameters:
        x - the x of the block being clicked
        y - the y of the block being clicked
        z - the z of the block being clicked
        placeDir - the clicked face of the block

      • buildOneBlock

        void buildOneBlock(int[] relativePos,
                   float yaw,
                   double x,
                   double y,
                   double z)
        Build one block based on the coordinates passed in
        Parameters:
        relativePos - an integer array with relative x, y, z and an optional side face
        yaw - the yaw of player
        x - x offset
        y - y offset
        z - z offset

      • setJumpMovementFactor

        void setJumpMovementFactor(float f)
        Set the factor that determines how far the player will move each tick if it is jumping or falling
        Parameters:
        f - the factor which is 0.02 by default

        void renderHighlightEntity(java.lang.String entityName,
                           int colorMode)
        Highlight an entity in render thread
        Parameters:
        entityName - name of the entity
        colorMode - 0: Enemy; 1: Target; 2: Other; 3: Friend; 4: Team

        Render highlight of chests in the game
        Parameters:
        maxChests - the limit on number of positions returned
        Returns:
        if maximum limit reached

        Set the size of name above the heads of entities
        Parameters:
        size - the size. Default: 1

        Render armor status of the player. Called in render thread

                    int range)
        Initialize Base Finder limits
        Parameters:
        maxBlocks - max artificial blocks to be rendered
        range - max range of blocks

        Render artificial blocks in Base Finder

      • stopSendingPackagesToServer

        void stopSendingPackagesToServer(java.lang.String types)
        Stop sending certain packages to the Minecraft server
        Parameters:
        types - comma separated list of: '1': Attack/Release/Dig; '2': Placement; '3': All others

                                      double posY,

                                      boolean isOnGround)
        Send a packet to server to indicate player position
        Parameters:
        posX - player x
        posY - player y
        posZ - player z
